title: 90/134/EEC: Commission Decision of 6 March 1990 amending for the second time Council Directive 82/894/EEC on the notification of animal diseases within the Community and temporarily amending the frequency of notification for bovine spongiform encephalopathy
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 6 March 1990
amending for the second time Council Directive 82/894/EEC on the notification of animal diseases within the Community and temporarily amending the frequency of notification for bovine spongiform encephalopathy
(90/134/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Annex I to Directive 82/894/EEC, 'bovine spongiform encephalopathy' is hereby added.
Notwithstanding Article 3 (1) of Directive 82/894/EEC, all outbreaks of bovine spongiform encephalopathy shall be notified until 30 June 1992 in accordance with Article 4 of Directive 82/894/EEC.
This Decision shall take effect on 1 April 1990.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 March 1990.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
